an3.31:1.1: “Sabrahmakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an3.31:1.2: Sapubbacariyakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an3.31:1.3: Sahuneyyani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an3.31:1.8: Bahukara, bhikkhave, matapitaro puttanam, apadaka posaka, imassa lokassa dassetaroti.
